structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS AS TO DITCHES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION

law.catch_line: Circuit Court's determination of whether assessment was properly made -- Court order conclusive.
law.text: The Circuit Court may cause proof to be taken as to whether the notice required by KRS 269.150 was given by the board of commissioners, and may, in its final judgment confirming the report, determine this fact and any other fact necessary to establish a binding assessment. The court may enter an order that all such steps have been properly taken, which order shall be prima facie evidence of the facts therein recited and conclusive upon all parties thereto.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2417a-8.
